official_title: A PHASE 2A, RANDOMIZED, DOUBLE-BLIND, PLACEBO-CONTROLLED, DOSE-RANGING, PARALLEL GROUP STUDY TO EVALUATE SAFETY, TOLERABILITY, AND PHARMACODYNAMICS OF PF-05221304 ADMINISTERED DAILY FOR 16-WEEKS TO ADULT SUBJECTS WITH NONALCOHOLIC FATTY LIVER DISEASE
inclusion_criteria:
* Body Mass Index >= 25 kg/m2
* Body Weight > 50 kg
* Liver fat (assessed via MRI-PDFF) >= 8%
* Biopsy-proven NASH - diagnosed in previous 24-months
* Presumed NASH - per Sponsor's definition
* NAFLD with minimal inflammation/fibrosis
* Features of Metabolic Syndrome
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Must have maximum age of 70 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Alcohol-induced steatohepatitis or other forms of chronic liver disease
* Positive for Hepatitis B, Hepatitis C, or Human Deficiency Virus
* Severe Renal Impairment
* Contraindications for MRI
